type.name: org.gradle.api.credentials.AwsCredentials
type.description: Represents credentials used to authenticate with Amazon Web Services.

method.name: getAccessKey
method.description: Returns the access key to use to authenticate with AWS.

method.name: getSecretKey
method.description: Returns the secret key to use to authenticate with AWS.

method.name: setAccessKey
method.description: Sets the access key to use to authenticate with AWS.

method.name: setSecretKey
method.description: Sets the secret key to use to authenticate with AWS.

property.name: accessKey
property.description: Returns the access key to use to authenticate with AWS.

property.name: secretKey
property.description: Returns the secret key to use to authenticate with AWS.
